urlencoded.description: (mandatory) name of the router
(mandatory) hostname/IP address of the router
(mandatory)
(mandatory)
(mandatory) router API port
(mandatory) tolerance days of isolation, if none, please fill with 0 (zero)
(mandatory) pick either "toggle" (disable/enable secret PPPoE, or "change-profile" (change profile PPPoE)
(optional) if "isolate-action" is filled with "change-profile", this should be mandatory
(optional) Auto Isolir. Set "true" if enabled, otherwise "false". Default to "false"

query.description: filter by customer id, not the id of customer, but customer_id, see Customers API.
filter by bill period, in format: YYYY-MM. for example, if want to take February 2025 bills, use 2025-02
filter by bill status, use 'unpaid' for unpaid bills, and 'paid', for well, paid bills. Use only 'unpaid' or 'paid', other than that will be assumed as no status filter

optional, fill with 'true' or 'false'. default to false. when set this to 'true', make sure to set is_paid as 'true' too.
optional, free string, payment method, in free string. When filling this, make sure to set the is_paid as true.
optional, time that the bill is paid, in format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. When filling this, make sure to set is_paid as true.
optional, payment proof image file for the bill, when uploading this, make sure to set is_paid as true.

optional, time that the bill is paid, in format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. When filling this, make sure to set is_paid as true.
optional, payment proof image file for the bill, when uploading this, make sure to set is_paid as true.

formdata.value: Transfer using Bank BCA, in face.
formdata.description: optional, additional payment information. When filling this, make sure to set the is_paid as true.
